description:
Haruki Shuu was the boyfriend she exploited daily.

One day, he saw her holding hands with another man as he left his part-time job. Upon questioning her, she treated him as a stalker and hugged that other dude.

Hurt, he goes to school the next day only to find that, apparently, he was the cheater and that he’s always been a horrible guy. He’s then isolated from the rest of the school.

Drowning in despair, he tries to jump off a bridge, hoping to disappear from this world…>
